demo.regionSelectionDesc: Use the region selector in the header (globe icon) to choose your region. Your selection is saved in localStorage and persists across sessions.
demo.currencyPricingDesc: All prices are automatically converted from the base USD price using current exchange rates. Symbol positioning and decimal places adjust per currency.
demo.numberFormattingDesc: Large numbers are formatted according to regional conventions (e.g., 1,234.56 vs 1.234,56).
